I have been playing CS:GO for over 5 years now, and I have seen them make good updates and trash updates. Although there are times when CS:GO feels like its been forgotten, there are updates that make me still play this game after all these years. Overall, I have thourghly enjoyed CS:GO because of its dynamic game play and the ammount of people who are still interested in this game keeps it fun.
